name: Super Bowl Showdown
description:
Super Bowl Showdown

Play as either the Los Angeles Rams or Cincinnati Bengals  for the Lombardi Trophy. 

Run or Pass your way to a Championship!

Inspired by Retro Football games such as Run and Gun football.

Info

I created this game in about 2 days as a challenge for myself. With that being said there might some bugs in the game that I have not noticed.

Other Projects

I created an Alien Horror game in one week and have continued to update it! If you are interested it's on Steam!
